page.title: 06Education in New Mills
page.content: There is a lot of education in New Mills. There are 6 Primary Schools and a Comprehensive School. We have found out that over the years the Comprehensive School has got bigger (more pupils). Some lessons are Social Studies, Typing, Hockey, Netball and Cross Country Running. They were not done a few years ago. We asked an old man what P.E. he did and he answered : Skipping, Running and Hopscotch. He didn't wear a uniform either.He said he just wore a badge with fruit on it.He also said the school he went to had about 200 pupils. We also spoke to a teacher and she said jobs were easy to find after she left college.
